Package fr.univlille.iutinfo.game

Class Cell

java.lang.Object
fr.univlille.iutinfo.game.Cell
All Implemented Interfaces:
fr.univlille.iutinfo.cam.player.perception.ICellEvent
public class Cell extends Object implements fr.univlille.iutinfo.cam.player.perception.ICellEvent
Represents a cell in a grid.

  • Constructor Details

    • Cell

      public Cell(boolean isEmpty, boolean isWall, boolean isShot, int posMonster, int lastPosMonster, Coordinates coord)
      Creates a new cell
      Parameters:
      isEmpty - If the cell is empty
      isWall - If the cell is a wall
      isShot - If the cell has been shot for the current turn
      posMonster - The last turn the monster was on the cell
      lastPosMonster - The last turn the hunter knew the monster was on the cell
      coord - The coordinates of the cell

    • Cell

      public Cell(boolean isEmpty, boolean isWall, boolean isShot, int posMonster, int lastPosMonster, int row, int col)
      Creates a new Cell.
      Parameters:
      isEmpty - If the cell is empty.
      isWall - If the cell is a wall.
      isShot - If the cell has been shot for the current turn.
      posMonster - The last turn the monster was on the cell.
      lastPosMonster - The last turn the hunter knew the monster was on the cell.
      row - The row position of the cell in the grid.
      col - The column position of the cell in the grid.
      See Also:
      • Coordinates

  • Method Details

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Returns whether the cell is empty (i.e. not a wall and not occupied by a monster)
      Returns:
      True if the cell is empty, false otherwise

    • isWall

      public boolean isWall()
      Returns whether the cell is a wall
      Returns:
      True if the cell is a wall, false otherwise

    • isShot

      public boolean isShot()
      Returns whether the cell has been shot
      Returns:
      True if the cell has been shot, false otherwise

    • getPosMonster

      public int getPosMonster()
      Returns the last turn the monster was on the cell
      Returns:
      The last turn the monster was on the cell, -1 if the monster has never been on the cell

    • getLastPosMonster

      public int getLastPosMonster()
      Returns the last turn the hunter knew the monster was on the cell
      Returns:
      The last turn the hunter knew the monster was on the cell, -1 if the monster has never been on the cell

    • setEmpty

      public void setEmpty(boolean empty)
      Set whether the cell is empty
      Parameters:
      empty - If True, the cell is empty; otherwise it isn't

    • setShot

      public void setShot(boolean shot)
      Set whether the cell has been shot
      Parameters:
      shot - If True, the cell has been shot, otherwise it hasn't been

    • setWall

    • canMove

      public boolean canMove(Cell currentCell, boolean diagonal, Item item)
      Returns true if the monster can move on the current cell, false otherwise.
      Parameters:
      currentCell - The current cell to check adjacency with
      diagonal - If the monster can move diagonally
      item - The item contained in the cell
      Returns:
      True if this cell is adjacent to the current cell, false otherwise

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Compares this cell to the specified object for equality.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      obj - The object to compare to.
      Returns:
      true if the specified object is a Cell and its coordinates match the coordinates of this cell, false otherwise.

    • getState

      public fr.univlille.iutinfo.cam.player.perception.ICellEvent.CellInfo getState()
      Returns the state of the cell.
      Specified by:
      getState in interface fr.univlille.iutinfo.cam.player.perception.ICellEvent
      Returns:
      The state of the cell represented by the CellInfo enum. Possible states are: - CellInfo.WALL if the cell is a wall - CellInfo.EXIT if the cell is an exit - CellInfo.HUNTER if the cell has been shot for the current turn - CellInfo.MONSTER if the cell is occupied by a monster - CellInfo.EMPTY if the cell is empty

    • getTurn

      public int getTurn()
      Retrieves the value of the turn for the cell.
      Specified by:
      getTurn in interface fr.univlille.iutinfo.cam.player.perception.ICellEvent
      Returns:
      The value of the turn for the cell

    • getCoord

      public fr.univlille.iutinfo.cam.player.perception.ICoordinate getCoord()
      Retrieves the coordinate of the cell.
      Specified by:
      getCoord in interface fr.univlille.iutinfo.cam.player.perception.ICellEvent
      Returns:
      The coordinate of the cell represented by an implementation of the ICoordinate interface. May be null if the cell does not have a coordinate assigned to it.
